title: @Riot For the love of god please start clash earlier.
body: For us players in nz clash starts at 9 pm and ends past 11 pm usually. For people who work a 9 to 5 it just does not work. Please riot.

replies.body: Keep in mind that when it's 9pm in New Zealand, it's also 4pm in Western Australia (a time at which many people might still be at work). The time that clash is set for is chosen in a way to best accommodate everyone in the region, but unfortunately with the wide array of timezones to cover not everyone is going to get an ideal time for them.
